Articles.Content:
Good evening and I am now starting to love KSP 2 as much as I love KSP 1. I know its early days, however, are we going to get more "general" use parts. Obviously going forward we are going to have base parts and Interstellar parts but what about your every day parts.

1. We got XL tanks but no XL engines?

2. We have two of each space plane except the XL?

3. We still have the same Mk3 cross section with no flat bottom . There was an awesome mod that gave us the Kerbal Mini Shuttle with a flat bottom that was a lifting body, a lot more realistic. Would love to see a MK3 shuttle type of parts in a MK 2 size? 

 

 

 

Its fantastic that we now have larger stabilisers, however, once again no XL parts. Is there scope to provide a full range of normal parts without going down the mod route?

 

Edited February 4 by Sochin
